name: CTRL (TheTacBanana)
description:
Note: You need to click on the box to type in it

CTRL is a Text Adventure where you assume the role of a hacker and you have to outsmart the AI trying to stop you. It has 10 endings, all relatively easy to get within 10 minutes.

It was made in 72 Hours for Mini Jam 19, Theme: Mysteries  Limitation: Combine 2 Genres.
